raw_body:
DE ZOYSA – EVELYN MADONNA (nee MACINTYRE) – Beloved wife of late Lucien de Zoysa,​ mother of Lana de Zoysa Wijemanne,​ mother-in-law of Channe Wijemanne,​ adoring grandmother of Senaya and Kaavinda Wijemanne,​ loving sister of Ernest,​ late Dinky,​ late Raja and of Gandhi Macintyre,​ loving sister-in-law of Nalini,​ Birte and Dorothy,​ much loved aunt of Amrit,​ Raina,​ Helger,​ Gunner,​ Rabi,​ Yohan,​ Judy and Timothy. Remains will lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour on Saturday,​ 18th May,​ from 8.00 a.m. to 3.00 p.m.,​ followed by a prayer service and cremation at 4.30 p.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella (New Crematorium).
033069
